verses.roman:
tasya sudyur abhūt putras
tasmād bahugavas tataḥ
saṁyātis tasyāhaṁyātī
raudrāśvas tat-sutaḥ smṛtaḥ

synonyms: tasya—of him (Cārupada); sudyuḥ—by the name Sudyu; abhūt—appeared; putraḥ—a son; tasmāt—from him (Sudyu); bahugavaḥ—a son named Bahugava; tataḥ—from him; saṁyātiḥ—a son named Saṁyāti; tasya—and from him; ahaṁyātiḥ—a son named Ahaṁyāti; raudrāśvaḥ—Raudrāśva; tat-sutaḥ—his son; smṛtaḥ—well known.
translation: The son of Cārupada was Sudyu, and the son of Sudyu was Bahugava. Bahugava's son was Saṁyāti. From Saṁyāti came a son named Ahaṁyāti, from whom Raudrāśva was born.
